name: Supreme Race on Highway
description:
Welcome in Supreme Race on Highway! Being a driver you have to drive as far as possible on the highway without accidents.

For maximum safety for you and for those around you the car has cruise control set at a fixed speed.

Let's see how good are you. Get your favorite car and get on the road!

Game Features:
- Endless mode on the highway
- Cruise control set up at a 75 km/h speed
- 27 cars to choose such as racing cars, police car or even tanks
- Enter in the game each 6 hours and get a special reward
